Users API
=========


Index Users
-----------

### Resource URL

```
https://api.examle.com/users.json
```

Show User
---------

### Resource URL

```
https://api.examle.com/users/:id.json
```

New User
--------

```
https://api.examle.com/users/new
```

Create User
-----------

```
https://api.examle.com/users/
```

Edit User
---------

```
https://api.examle.com/users/:new.json
```

Update User
-----------

```
https://api.examle.com/users/:new.json
```
